modules.name: LFMFull
modules.description:
Psycho visualizer, shown in a separate display. 
Based on ProjectM, this module uses MilkDrop/Winamp presets.

modules.name: LFMEmbedded
modules.description:
Psycho visualizer, shown in an embedded display. 
Based on ProjectM, this module uses MilkDrop/Winamp presets.
